trans-unit.source: –become
trans-unit.target: -成为

trans-unit.source: –become-enabled
trans-unit.target: –启用

trans-unit.source: –diff
trans-unit.target: –diff

trans-unit.source: ) to increase readability.
trans-unit.target: ）以提高可读性。

trans-unit.source: /api/v1
trans-unit.target: / api / v1

trans-unit.source: /api/v2
trans-unit.target: / api / v2

trans-unit.source: Deprecated features:
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用的功能：

trans-unit.source: General:
trans-unit.target: 一般：

trans-unit.source: Reflected from 3.1.8:
Updates from Tower 3.2:
trans-unit.target: 3.2版的更新：

trans-unit.source: tower-cli is a legacy command line tool for Ansible Tower.
trans-unit.target: tower-cli是Ansible Tower的旧版命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: A CLI tool for Ansible Tower and AWX.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Tower和AWX的CLI工具。

trans-unit.source: Add RPM specfile and Makefile
trans-unit.target: 添加RPM规范文件和Makefile

trans-unit.source: Add SSL corner case error handling and suggestion
trans-unit.target: 增加SSL角标错误处理及建议

trans-unit.source: Add YAML output format against JSON and humanized output formats
trans-unit.target: 增加YAML输出格式与JSON和人性化的输出格式的对照。

trans-unit.source: Add ability to create group as subgroup of another group
trans-unit.target: 增加创建组作为另一个组的子组的功能。

trans-unit.source: Add command
trans-unit.target: 添加命令

trans-unit.source: Add field for job_slice_count to job template resource
trans-unit.target: 在工作模板资源中添加job_slice_count字段。

trans-unit.source: Add new format option to just echo id.
trans-unit.target: 增加新的格式选项,只呼应id。

trans-unit.source: Add new page_size parameter to list view.
trans-unit.target: 为列表视图添加新的page_size参数。

trans-unit.source: Add organization job_template_role to role management
trans-unit.target: 将组织job_template_role添加到角色管理中。

trans-unit.source: Add scm_update_cache_timeout field to project resource.
trans-unit.target: 在项目资源中增加scm_update_cache_timeout字段。

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: 新增

trans-unit.source: Added ability to set local scope for config file
trans-unit.target: 增加了为配置文件设置本地范围的功能

trans-unit.source: Added abstract resource for job events
trans-unit.target: 为工作事件添加了抽象资源

trans-unit.source: Added an example bash script to demonstrate tower-cli usage
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个bash脚本示例来演示塔-克里的使用。

trans-unit.source: Added cleaner handling of Unicode
trans-unit.target: 增加了更清晰的Unicode处理

trans-unit.source: Added credential_type resource and significantly modified credential resource to reveal user-defined credentials feature of Tower 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 增加了credential_type资源,并对credential资源进行了大幅修改,揭示了Tower 3.2的用户自定义凭证功能。

trans-unit.source: Added custom SSL certificate support
trans-unit.target: 增加了对自定义SSL证书的支持

trans-unit.source: Added deprecation warnings
trans-unit.target: 增加了弃用警告

trans-unit.source: Added description display option
trans-unit.target: 增加了描述显示选项

trans-unit.source: Added job template callback support
trans-unit.target: 新增作业模板回调支持

trans-unit.source: Added job template extra credential (dis)association to reveal extra_credential field of 3.2 job templates.
trans-unit.target: 增加了工作模板的额外凭证(dis)关联,以显示3.2工作模板的extra_credential字段。

trans-unit.source: Added job template skip_tags prompting support
trans-unit.target: 增加了工作模板 skip_tags 提示支持。

trans-unit.source: Added job_tags on job launches
trans-unit.target: 在工作启动时增加了job_tags

trans-unit.source: Added labels
trans-unit.target: 添加标签

trans-unit.source: Added login command for token-based auth (AWX feature)
trans-unit.target: 添加了基于令牌的登录命令(AWX功能)。

trans-unit.source: Added notification templates
trans-unit.target: 添加了通知模板

trans-unit.source: Added option for project local path
trans-unit.target: 增加了项目本地路径的选项

trans-unit.source: Added options for workflow nodes and schedules (AWX feature)
trans-unit.target: 增加了工作流节点和计划的选项(AWX功能)。

trans-unit.source: Added project and inventory update resources to enable more functionality
trans-unit.target: 增加了项目和清单更新资源,以实现更多的功能。

trans-unit.source: Added project_update and inventory_update resources to allow canceling and deleting.
trans-unit.target: 增加了项目更新和库存更新资源,允许取消和删除。

trans-unit.source: Added resource for activity stream
trans-unit.target: 为活动流添加资源

trans-unit.source: Added resource role for tower3.0 and permission for previous tower versions
trans-unit.target: 增加了塔楼3.0的资源角色和以前塔楼版本的权限。

trans-unit.source: Added send and receive commands to export and import resources
trans-unit.target: 添加了导出和导入资源的发送和接收命令。

trans-unit.source: Added setting “verify_ssl” to disallow insecure connections
trans-unit.target: 添加了设置“ verify_ssl”以禁止不安全的连接

trans-unit.source: Added settings command to manage Tower settings via Tower CLI. Reflecting Configure Tower in Tower (CTiT) feature of Tower 3.1.
trans-unit.target: 增加了通过塔式CLI管理塔式设置的设置命令。反映了Tower 3.1的Configure Tower in Tower (CTiT)功能。

trans-unit.source: Added shields for github README
trans-unit.target: 为github README添加了屏蔽。

trans-unit.source: Added support for Tower 3.2 SCM inventory sources.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对Tower 3.2 SCM库存源的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for additional cloud credentials
trans-unit.target: 增加了对其他云证书的支持

trans-unit.source: Added support for import and export role memberships as well
trans-unit.target: 增加了对导入和导出角色成员资格的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for new job_template job launch endpoint
trans-unit.target: 添加了对新的job_template作业启动端点的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for server-side copying (AWX feature)
trans-unit.target: 增加了对服务器端复制的支持(AWX功能)。

trans-unit.source: Added support for system auditors
trans-unit.target: 增加了对系统审计人员的支持

trans-unit.source: Added support for using settings from environment vars in normal CLI use
trans-unit.target: 增加了对在普通CLI中使用环境变量设置的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added tests for Python versions 2.6 through 3.4
trans-unit.target: 添加了Python 2.6到3.4版本的测试。

trans-unit.source: Added text indicator for resource change
trans-unit.target: 增加了资源变动的文字指示器

trans-unit.source: Added the ability to associate a project with an organization
trans-unit.target: 增加了将项目与组织联系起来的功能。

trans-unit.source: Added the ability to customize the set of fields used as options for a resource
trans-unit.target: 增加了自定义作为资源选项的字段集的功能。

trans-unit.source: Added the ability to run ad hoc commands
trans-unit.target: 增加了运行临时命令的功能

trans-unit.source: Added unicode support to extra_vars and variable types.
trans-unit.target: 为extra_vars和变量类型添加了unicode支持。

trans-unit.source: Added workflow, workflow_job and node endpoints to manipulate workflow graph and manage workflow job resources. Reflecting workflows feature of Tower 3.1.
trans-unit.target: 增加了工作流、工作流_job和节点端点,用于操作工作流图和管理工作流作业资源。反映了 Tower 3.1 的工作流功能。

trans-unit.source: Allow adding workflows inside of workflows
trans-unit.target: 允许在工作流中添加工作流。

trans-unit.source: Allow exporting schedules of workflows
trans-unit.target: 允许导出工作流程的时间表

trans-unit.source: Allow hosts, inventory, and groups to use variables from the command line and denote a file by starting with “@”
trans-unit.target: 允许主机，清单和组从命令行使用变量，并以“ @”开头表示文件

trans-unit.source: Allow managing certain user-configurable instance properties
trans-unit.target: 允许管理某些用户可配置的实例属性。

trans-unit.source: Allow notifications to be used with projects
trans-unit.target: 允许通知与项目一起使用

trans-unit.source: Allow resource disassociation with “null”
trans-unit.target: 允许资源与“ null”分离

trans-unit.source: Allow scan JTs as an option for “job_type”
trans-unit.target: 允许将扫描JT作为“ job_type”的选项

trans-unit.source: Allow setting the custom virtual environment on projects and organizations
trans-unit.target: 允许设置项目和组织的自定义虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: Allowed setup and testing to proceed without root privileges
trans-unit.target: 允许在没有root权限的情况下进行设置和测试。

trans-unit.source: Allowed use of –format=id with multiple results
trans-unit.target: 允许将–format = id与多个结果一起使用

trans-unit.source: Anyone developing new tooling around AWX or Ansible Tower via a Unix command line is suggested to use the new CLI.
trans-unit.target: 建议任何通过Unix命令行开发围绕AWX或Ansible Tower的新工具的人使用新的CLI。

trans-unit.source: Associating labels to job template now takes option as –job-template
trans-unit.target: 现在，将标签与作业模板相关联的选项为–job-template

trans-unit.source: Begin process to deprecate python 2.6.
trans-unit.target: 开始废止python 2.6的进程。

trans-unit.source: Behavior change of workflow schema command. Now schema will both create new nodes and delete existing nodes when needed to make the resulting workflow topology exactly the same as described in schema file.
trans-unit.target: 工作流模式命令的行为改变。现在,模式将在需要时创建新节点和删除现有节点,使产生的工作流拓扑结构与模式文件中描述的完全一致。

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes for label creation, workflow monitor, global config, role list
trans-unit.target: 修正了标签创建、工作流监控、全局配置、角色列表的错误。

trans-unit.source: Categorize help text options for resource action commands (like
trans-unit.target: 将资源操作命令的帮助文本选项分类(如

trans-unit.source: Changed extra_vars behavior to be more compliant by re-parsing vars, even when only one source exists
trans-unit.target: 修改了extra_vars的行为,即使只有一个源存在,也可以通过重新解析vars来实现更多的合规性。

trans-unit.source: Changed the extra_vars parameters to align with Ansible parameter handling
trans-unit.target: 修改了extra_vars参数,使其与Ansible参数处理方式一致。

trans-unit.source: Combine click parameters from multiple base classes in metaclass.
trans-unit.target: 结合元类中多个基类的点击参数。

trans-unit.source: Combined ” launch-time extra_vars” with ” job_template extra_vars” for older Tower versions
trans-unit.target: 对于较旧的Tower版本，将“启动时间extra_vars”与“ job_template extra_vars”组合在一起

trans-unit.source: Disabled launching a job using the jobs endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 停用使用job端点启动作业。

trans-unit.source: Enable configuring tower-cli via environment variables
trans-unit.target: 启用通过环境变量配置塔式起重机。

trans-unit.source: Enabled (dis)associating instance groups to(from) organization, job_template and inventory resources to reveal instance/instance group feature of Tower 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 启用实例组与组织、job_template和库存资源的关联,以显示Tower 3.2的实例/实例组功能。

trans-unit.source: Enhanced debug log format (support multi-line debug log)
trans-unit.target: 增强调试日志格式(支持多行调试日志)。

trans-unit.source: Enhanced json library usage to prevent traceback when using earlier python 2.6 versions.
trans-unit.target: 增强了json库的使用,以防止在使用早期python 2.6版本时出现回溯。

trans-unit.source: Expand some resource fields, including hipchat rooms for notification template and allow_simultaneous for job templates.
trans-unit.target: 展开部分资源字段,包括通知模板的hipchat房间和工作模板的allow_simultaneous。

trans-unit.source: Expanded credential resource to allow options for cloud credentials
trans-unit.target: 扩展了凭证资源,允许云凭证的选择。

trans-unit.source: Expanded monitoring capability to include projects and inventory sources
trans-unit.target: 扩大监测能力,纳入项目和清单来源

trans-unit.source: Expose custom inventory script resource to the user
trans-unit.target: 将自定义库存脚本资源暴露给用户

trans-unit.source: Exposed additional options for a cloud inventory source
trans-unit.target: 披露了云库存源的其他选项

trans-unit.source: Fix a usage compatibility issue for Ansible Tower modules.
trans-unit.target: 修复Ansible Tower模块的使用兼容性问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug of incomplete role membership lookup, preventing granting of roles.
trans-unit.target: 修正角色成员查询不完整,无法授予角色的bug。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug using HipChat notification “notify” option
trans-unit.target: 使用HipChat通知“ notify”选项修复错误

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where –all-pages was ignored listing team roles
trans-unit.target: 修复–忽略所有页面列出团队角色的错误

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where verify_ssl config parameter was not respected
trans-unit.target: 修复了verify_ssl配置参数不被尊重的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug where workflow schema would hang if there were too many nodes
trans-unit.target: 修复了工作流模式在节点过多的情况下会挂起的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix bugs with special characters in config options
trans-unit.target: 修复配置选项中特殊字符的错误

trans-unit.source: Fix error associating credential with workflow node
trans-unit.target: 修正将凭证与工作流节点关联的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix error with use of –insecure flag
trans-unit.target: 使用–insecure标志修复错误

trans-unit.source: Fix formatting for upload to PyPI server
trans-unit.target: 修正上传至PyPI服务器的格式

trans-unit.source: Fix receive command bug when host name was in multiple inventories
trans-unit.target: 修正主机名在多个目录中时接收命令的错误

trans-unit.source: Fix receive command bug when importing to custom credential types
trans-unit.target: 修正导入到自定义凭证类型时接收命令的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix receive command bugs related template labels
trans-unit.target: 修复与模板标签相关的接收命令错误

trans-unit.source: Fix receive command when schedules have survey answers
trans-unit.target: 修正当计划表有调查问卷答案时的接收命令

trans-unit.source: Fix send command error when job and workflow have the same name
trans-unit.target: 当作业和工作流名称相同时,修复发送命令错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix some unicode errors in send/receive commands
trans-unit.target: 修正发送/接收命令中的一些unicode错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix unicode bug in human display format.
trans-unit.target: 修复人体显示格式的unicode错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in 3.1.0 which sometimes causes traceback when
trans-unit.target: 修正了3.1.0中的一个bug,该bug有时会导致当

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where creating job templates with –extra-vars did not work after 3.1.0 upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 修复了3.1.0升级后无法使用–extra-vars创建作业模板的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where extra_vars were dropped in some commands.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个在某些命令中会丢弃 extra_vars 的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where global flags are not added to some commands.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个全局标志不被添加到某些命令中的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug which blocks named resources from using runtime configure settings.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个阻止命名资源使用运行时配置设置的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a python 3.5 compatibility issue that causes job monitor traceback.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个python 3.5兼容问题,该问题会导致作业监控器回溯。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue where the settings file could be world readable
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个设置文件可以被世界读取的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed associating labels to workflows
trans-unit.target: 修正了将标签关联到工作流程的问题

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug affecting force-on-exists and fail_on_found options
trans-unit.target: 修正了影响Force-on-exists和fail_on_found选项的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug that caused debug messages to hang with long line lengths
trans-unit.target: 修正了长行时导致调试消息挂起的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug when copying resources that use the variables field type
trans-unit.target: 修正了复制使用变量字段类型的资源时的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where –all-pages was ignored for roles
trans-unit.target: 修复了–忽略所有页面角色的错误

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug with side-by-side install of v1 and v2
trans-unit.target: 修正了v1和v2并排安装时的bug

trans-unit.source: Fixed group modify bug, avoid sending unwanted fields in modify requests
trans-unit.target: 修正了群组修改错误,避免在修改请求中发送不需要的字段。

trans-unit.source: Fixed traceback when launching job with –use-job-endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 修复了使用–use-job-endpoint启动作业时的回溯。

trans-unit.source: Follow up 3.1.6 by duplicating exceptions.py to support
trans-unit.target: 跟进3.1.6,复制exceptions.py来支持

trans-unit.source: Give indication of “changed” apart from color
trans-unit.target: 除颜色外，指示“已更改”

trans-unit.source: Help text upgrades
trans-unit.target: 帮助文本升级

trans-unit.source: Hide display of page number for human-formatted single page results
trans-unit.target: 隐藏人工格式的单页结果的页码显示。

trans-unit.source: Improve error handling for template specification in workflow schema command.
trans-unit.target: 改进工作流模式命令中模板规范的错误处理。

trans-unit.source: Improved job monitoring functionality to enable standard out streaming, which displays real-time job output on command line.
trans-unit.target: 改进作业监控功能,实现标准的出流,在命令行上显示实时作业输出。

trans-unit.source: Include method of installing with alias tower-cli-v2
trans-unit.target: 包括用别名塔-cli-v2安装的方法。

trans-unit.source: Include related credentials to job templates in send and receive commands
trans-unit.target: 在发送和接收命令中包括与作业模板相关的凭证。

trans-unit.source: Include tests and docs in the release tarball
trans-unit.target: 在发布的压缩包中包含测试和文档。

trans-unit.source: Included more detail when displaying job information
trans-unit.target: 显示工作信息时包含更多细节

trans-unit.source: Included timeout option to certain unified job template resources. Reflecting job timeout feature of Tower 3.1.
trans-unit.target: 对某些统一的作业模板资源加入了超时选项。反映了Tower 3.1的作业超时功能。

trans-unit.source: Installed new CLI entry point, awx-cli
trans-unit.target: 安装了新的CLI入口点,awx-cli。

trans-unit.source: It is also what the Ansible
trans-unit.target: 这也是Ansible的

trans-unit.source: Job template associate_credential now uses “credentials” endpoint
trans-unit.target: 作业模板associate_credential现在使用“凭据”端点

trans-unit.source: Lookup related inventory sources with “starts with” logic if its name is not fully qualified.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称不完全合格，则使用“开头为”逻辑查找与清单相关的清单资源。

trans-unit.source: Made inventory_source an external resource and remove the old relationship to its associated group. Remove launching inventory updates from group resource.
trans-unit.target: 将 inventory_source 变为外部资源,并删除与其关联组的旧关系。从组资源中删除启动库存更新。

trans-unit.source: Made many-to-many relations easier to manage with a new field type
trans-unit.target: 通过新的字段类型,使多对多关系更容易管理。

trans-unit.source: Major code base file structure refactor. Now all click-related logics are moved to
trans-unit.target: 主要的代码库文件结构重构。现在所有与点击相关的逻辑都被移到了

trans-unit.source: Major documentation updates. From 3.2.0 docs are hosted on http://tower-cli.readthedocs.io.
trans-unit.target: 主要文档更新。从3.2.0版开始，文档托管在http://tower-cli.readthedocs.io上。

trans-unit.source: Migrated to API V2. All API calls will start with
trans-unit.target: 迁移到API V2。所有API调用将以

trans-unit.source: Minor typo and help text updates.
trans-unit.target: 小的错别字和帮助文字更新。

trans-unit.source: Name change from ‘foreman’ to ‘satellite6’ in credential kind choices.
trans-unit.target: 在凭据类型选择中，名称从“ foreman”更改为“ satellite6”。

trans-unit.source: New credential fields to support openstack-v2, networking and azure
trans-unit.target: 新的凭证字段支持openstack-v2、网络和 azure。

trans-unit.source: New job launch option for backwards compatibility
trans-unit.target: 新的工作启动选项,向后兼容

trans-unit.source: New options for inventory source/group. Add implicit resource inventory script.
trans-unit.target: 库存源/组的新选项。增加隐式资源清单脚本。

trans-unit.source: New tower-cli option to display tower-cli version
trans-unit.target: 新的塔-克里选项可显示塔-克里版本。

trans-unit.source: Officially support using tower_cli as a python library.
trans-unit.target: 官方支持使用 tower_cli 作为 python 库。

trans-unit.source: Password prompt written to stderr now
trans-unit.target: 密码提示现在写到stderr了

trans-unit.source: Pin the click library to avoid changing look and feel of output.
trans-unit.target: 销点击库,避免改变输出的外观和感觉。

trans-unit.source: Pluggable resource architecture built around click
trans-unit.target: 基于点击的可插拔资源架构

trans-unit.source: Prevent throwing unnecessary warning when reading from global configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 防止在读取全局配置文件时抛出不必要的警告。

trans-unit.source: Process deprecated vault_credential parameter with extra request
trans-unit.target: 用额外的请求处理过时的vault_credential参数。

trans-unit.source: Release History
trans-unit.target: 发行历史

trans-unit.source: Remove outdated association function for project’s organization.
trans-unit.target: 删除项目组织的过时关联功能。

trans-unit.source: Removed Rackspace options.
trans-unit.target: 删除了Rackspace选项。

trans-unit.source: Removed all source-specific inventory source fields and replaced them with a
trans-unit.target: 删除了所有特定来源的清单来源字段,并将其替换为:

trans-unit.source: Removed permission resource.
trans-unit.target: 删除了权限资源。

trans-unit.source: Removed scan jobs in favor of new job fact cache.
trans-unit.target: 删除了扫描作业,改为新的作业事实缓存。

trans-unit.source: Send command now uses default terminal background color
trans-unit.target: 发送命令现在使用默认的终端背景色

trans-unit.source: Several fixes on RPM spec file.
trans-unit.target: 对RPM规范文件进行了一些修正。

trans-unit.source: Several minor bug fixes to improve user experience.
trans-unit.target: 一些小的bug修复,提高用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Support auth-token-based authentication for Tower CLI requests.
trans-unit.target: 支持基于自动令牌的塔式CLI请求认证。

trans-unit.source: Support managing workflow roles, labels and notifications via Tower CLI.
trans-unit.target: 支持通过Tower CLI管理工作流角色、标签和通知。

trans-unit.source: Support prompting for inventory and variables with workflows
trans-unit.target: 支持用工作流提示库存和变量。

trans-unit.source: Support resource copy subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 支持资源复制子命令。

trans-unit.source: Supporting correct operation of the modules is the maintenance aim of this package.
trans-unit.target: 支持模块的正确运行是本软件包的维护目的。

trans-unit.source: These modules are now vendored as part of the AWX collection at:
trans-unit.target: 这些模块现在作为AWX系列的一部分在以下地点销售:

trans-unit.target: 塔楼兼容性修复
